Author: simmons121
Title: [ANN]LifeTask-The first decentralized platform for a talent driven job market
Body: LifeTask is a talent driven platform. Lifetask is turning the process around by using artificial intelligence to match your competences, talents and experiences with the most compatible opportunities possible. Quick, easy and simple at a fraction of the cost. Lifetask provides your dream job – your vocation which is the perfect solution for the employer too. Lifetask provides the perfect match for the companies for their vacancy. –more productivity, more quality, more capability, more motivation, more personal development, more passion, more happiness.  Visit our website for more information:- https://lifetask.io/

Author: bkbirge
Title: [ANN]LifeTask-The first decentralized platform for a talent driven job market
Body: This looks like a fantastic idea for a business that actually uses the blockchain as an integral part, not just a gimmick to sell coins. However I see one issue, maybe it has been addressed already but I'm not reading 100 pages of "Reserved! When's the airdrop?" posts to get to it, and that is that soft skills are a far better predictor of employee success than hard quantifiable technical competencies. The technical competency needs to be there of course, but if you are a robot with zero social skills and low ability to work with others then you are a liability to your employer. How does the platform address that? Those are skills that are not necessarily quantifiable.

Author: simmons121
Title: [ANN]LifeTask-The first decentralized platform for a talent driven job market
Body: LifeTask uses implemented artificial intelligence to match candidates to vacancies. It consists of two clouds, namely a cloud containing candidates’ talents and interests, together with a cloud that contains employers’ requirements.

Author: simmons121
Title: [ANN]LifeTask-The first decentralized platform for a talent driven job market
Body: Thank you for your kind words! We are growing because of investors like you! LifeTask will turn the recruitment industry on its head. It puts the competencies of potential candidates in full focus, and places the onus on employers to use the platform to find their dream candidate. Do stay tuned for more updates!

Author: bkbirge
Title: [ANN]LifeTask-The first decentralized platform for a talent driven job market
Body: That sounds great but you didn't really address the question. How does your platform handle soft skills, emotional intelligence, team compatibility, etc. These are the things that employers have trouble sourcing, most of the time they do not have trouble finding technical skills.

Title: [ANN]LifeTask-The first decentralized platform for a talent driven job market

Author: simmons121
Title: [ANN]LifeTask-The first decentralized platform for a talent driven job market
Body: 1. Win-win situation for employer and job seeker to fulfill their needs through providing good opportunity for job-seekers and skilled employee to the companies through AI driven platform 2. AI will automate and overcome the current loop holes into the traditional staffing systems. 3. Competency could bring lot of good benefits to employer to connect highly skilled job seekers in no time. 4. Lot of time and cost would be saved on bringing this into practice.  For more information, I request you to read our whitepaper: https://lifetask.io/lifetask-wp.pdf

Author: simmons121
Title: [ANN]LifeTask-The first decentralized platform for a talent driven job market
Body: It is a Peer-to-Peer, decentralized system based on the latest and fastest blockchain technology. LifeTask seeks to create a community of specialists, giving an overview of the talent that’s available on a regional, national or international level.

Author: simmons121
Title: [ANN]LifeTask-The first decentralized platform for a talent driven job market
Body: LifeTask can change the job market because it prioritizes human competencies above all else. This allows employers to find exactly the right candidate for their requirements with immense speed and at a fraction of the cost of using a traditional recruitment website or agency. What’s more is that the candidate will also be matched to an employer that’s as close to his or her ideals as is possible.

Author: ggaggauk0916
Title: [ANN]LifeTask-The first decentralized platform for a talent driven job market
Body: LifeTask is the first-ever decentralised competence platform for a talent-driven job market that enables individuals to maximize their potential in their chosen profession or vocation.  LifeTask is the premier solution for your professional development in the burgeoning world of digital jobs. It allows companies to find the individual that is a perfect fit for their needs by showcasing your competencies and experience in a fraction of the time (and at a fraction of the cost) compared to the traditional job market.  LifeTask is an AI based matching platform between competence providers and competence seekers. LifeTask matched your competences and your potentials with the needs of competence seekers, like employers, companies and organisations to provide your dream job for the benefit of the employer, the competence seeker too.  I was touched by upper Life Task project.

Author: JB66
Title: [ANN]LifeTask-The first decentralized platform for a talent driven job market
Body: I like this project for the emphasis on competences. I always have wondered why recruitment agencies and head hunter meanly look for someone who has done a job for ages and would consider it a challenge to do the same (for a little higher salary maybe) for another employer. Also HR (in my 40 years of experience) is more interested in skills than passion (although they would never admit that). I see that the young people today are really different than 25 years ago. They are more interested in employing themselves and doing the things they like, then do a boring job with the promise that after a long time, they will be rewarded by real interesting work/positions/payment. And most jobs are changing so quickly that focusing on skills seems more and more non effective. So all together the shift towards competences means more motivation, better results for the employer and better use of human assets. So, I support this project.
